channel.title: High-Cardinality on OpenTelemetry Architecture & Implementation
channel.description: Recent content in High-Cardinality on OpenTelemetry Architecture & Implementation

item.title: Beyond Prometheus: Building a High-Cardinality CockroachDB Receiver for OpenTelemetry
item.description: How to build a custom OpenTelemetry receiver that queries CockroachDB internals directly, preserving high-cardinality dimensional data that standard Prometheus scraping loses
